*|Tom Frieden (former CDC director): Commentary for Doctor Evidence |*
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}, I thought this would be of interest to you: Guideline & Research Organizations Worldwide for Transparency & Harmonization (GROWTH) is dedicated to the promotion of evidence-based knowledge to inform clinical practice guidelines, treatment decisions, and health policy. The monthly GROWTH Newsletter informs readers of pertinent content from a variety of sources covering a diverse range of topics and events relevant to evidence-based medicine. The curated collection of GROWTH Commentaries are written by prominent leaders in academia, medicine, research, and government.
Don’t miss the conclusion of the special GROWTH Commentaries series on Global Health, written by:
Other authors from this series include:
August, 2017 – Rebecca Martin, PhD, Director of the Center for Global Health at the CDC September, 2017 – Mauricio Ferri, MD, MS, and Susan L Norris, MD, MPH, MS, Consultant to the WHO Guidelines Review Committee Secretariat and Secretary of the WHO Guidelines Review Committee, respectively October, 2017 – Anna Rosling Ronnlund, MS, Co-Founder and Project Manager of GapMinder
